## Entity.getComponent() method

Gets a component, if it doesn't exist, it throws an Error.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getComponent<T = any>(component: string): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  component | <code>string</code> | component class or name |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T`
